Address.Address1: KUCUK AYASOFYA MAHALLESI CAYIROGLU SOKAK. NO : 1

Description.Text: The Albatros Premier located in main heart of Old City Center called Sultanahmet, where all famous historical monuments such as St.Sophia, Blue Mosque, Grand Bazaar, Topkapi Palace and many other sides. In the short distance from the Hotel there are: city center, countryside, seaside location. Whether you are travelling to Istanbul for business, pleasure or planning a meeting Albatros Premier Hotel is always ready to welcome you and provide you with the highest quality services as a name Albatros Premier.Albatros Premier Hotel is here to serve you with Turkish hospitality together with western mentality. Remarks: dinner transfer minibar they are extras. Hotel also offers the facility of Barbecue area, Lobby and Reception.

The Albatros Premier located in main heart of Old City Center called Sultanahmet, where all famous historical monuments such as St.Sophia, Blue Mosque, Grand Bazaar, Topkapi Palace and many other sides.

Triple Room - Triple room offers 3 separate beds with air conditioning, balcony / terrace, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, en-suite / private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, kettle, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, room service, safe in room, telephone, valet service, tea and coffee making facilities. All Rooms are appointed in traditional ottoman designed to provide you with full comfort while your stay. The Hotel area and all rooms complimentary wired/ Wireless Internet access are available.
Single Room - Single room offers one double bed with air conditioning, balcony / terrace, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, ensuite / private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, kettle, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, room service, safe in room, telephone, valet service, tea and coffee making facilities. All Rooms are appointed in traditional ottoman designed to provide you with full comfort while your stay. The Hotel area and all rooms complimentary wired/ Wireless Internet access are available.
Double/Twin Room - Double/Twin room offers one double bed or two single beds with air conditioning, balcony / terrace, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, ensuite / private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, kettle, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, room service, safe in room, telephone, valet service, tea and coffee making facilities. All Rooms are appointed in traditional ottoman designed to provide you with full comfort while your stay. The Hotel area and all rooms complimentary wired/ Wireless Internet access are available.
